translation.description: Under the Central Bank of Malaysia Act 2009 (CBA 2009), BNM is entrusted to hold and manage international reserves for the purpose of ensuring financial and monetary stability, as well as maintaining public confidence. The management of international reserves by BNM is subject to a strict governance and risk management framework established pursuant to the CBA 2009. This dashboards tracks the 3 primary measures of international reserve adequacy announced by BNM twice per month.
